item.title: CVE-2024-34420|2024-05-09T11:29:45.160Z -- talspotim -- Comments Evolved for WordPress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in talspotim Comments Evolved for WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Comments Evolved for WordPress: from n/a through 1.6.3.
